## Bio

With a profound expertise in biostatistics and clinical research, Turjya Laskar specializes in delivering insightful analyses and innovative solutions across diverse areas including survival analysis, meta-analysis, and machine learning. Leveraging a strong background in public health, Turjya excels in applying statistical methods to unravel complex data, drive evidence-based decision-making, and contribute to advancements in medical research.

Turjya's proficiency extends across a range of statistical software and programming languages, ensuring a robust approach to data analysis and interpretation. Committed to enhancing research outcomes and improving public health strategies, Turjya brings a combination of analytical skills, domain knowledge, and a dedication to excellence in every project undertaken.

Whether you're seeking expertise in clinical trial analysis, survival data modeling, or integrating machine learning techniques into your research, Turjya Laskar offers a comprehensive and meticulous approach to meet your biostatistical needs.
